text:
You close the case file. The report is complete.

Mass hysteria. Shared delusion. Environmental factors. Perfectly explainable.

The missing? Runaways. Coincidence. Statistical anomaly.

The supernatural elements? Trauma response. Pattern-seeking behavior. The human mind's desperate attempt to find meaning in chaos.

You pack your bags methodically. Everything in its place.

As you drive away from Tyger Tyger, you don't look in the rearview mirror.

But the silence follows you anyway.

It always does.
